snippet.title: Escape from Vulcan's Isle for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

Escape from Vulcan's Isle is an adventure-RPG, in which you are on an island filled wih volcanoes, monsters and friendly villages.


What I think:

Okay game, but I don't like how you start with around 7-9 HP each time...
